title: 恋心・センプク中 [Koigokoro Senpukuchuu]
description: There are seven love charms that are circulated at Ayase Academy. Trusting those, Ritsuka believes that she will have a wonderful boyfriend. However, Kuze-kun, who's super scary and infamous at school, keeps getting in her way... Will Ritsuka find the love of her destiny?!
author: Saki Shiumi
